Contact Me

If you’re interested in growing your business, expanding your exposure, dominating your local market, and increasing your sales then you’ve come to the right place.

I’ve helped build two companies in the automotive repair industry, with the most recent seeing increased sales from $20k/month to $600k/month in just a few short years.  Business doubled every month for five years straight and it is still growing.
Here’s how it was done…

– Creative marketing
– Innovative websites
– Google/SEO
– Sales and Presentations
– Promos, Videos
– Powerful CRMs
– Tradeshows

Today, you don’t need to hire a full-time marketing employee to have on staff. A good consultant with a proven track record will help you achieve the results you want. I’m taking all of the principles and blueprints I learned and will apply them to your business while teaching you how to do it yourself. 
This is our passion and our specialty…helping small businesses grow. In fact, we’re small, very small. And that’s just the type of company you want by your side because you’ll receive the type of hands-on, concierge-level of service you deserve.  

Schedule a Free SEO or Marketing Consulting Call

Consulting for search engine optimization, marketing strategies, and Airtable.

BRAND/SEO

Automotive Industry

If you’re in the automotive repair industry and looking to grow your business, then search no further. Not sure where to start or what to do when it comes to marketing, creating content, or building your website?

You’re at the right place.

We’ve spent years determining what works and have the results to prove it, like growing our last business from 20k/month in sales to over 600k/month in just a few, short years.

We know the importance of cycle-time, severity, being a DRP, and customer and insurance relations.

  • See more

Integration Partners

Common Questions

How can I grow my business in the automotive industry?

You have to dominate your local market within a 10 mile radius and make customers WANT to choose you. 

How can I improve my SEO, Google search?

A user-friendly, fast, reliable website that allows your to post content updates and useful information for your customers. Plus content like videos, informative posts and so much more. 

How can I make a good presentation that stands out?

Start by making your slides different than the status quo. This means less text and bullet points and more images and video. We know how to create your presentations to be memorable. 

How can I compete against larger businesses in a saturated market?

Easy and we’ll show you how. We can help your business be a trusted advisor to your current and prospective customers in your markets. 

What are some ways I can improve my website?

We’ll help you create or re-design your website to be fast, reliable and the ultimate customer experience. Your website needs to be a place customers frequent, but first you need to give them a reason to. 

What are some of the best marketing techniques I can use?

First, it needs to be creative. So whether it’s print or digital marketing, email campaigns, video or presentations, it NEEDS to stand-out. And we’ll make that happen.

What exactly is a CRM and how does yours work?

A CRM is a centralized place that houses all your contacts and prospects, their data and marketing campaigns, like email. We’ve tried them all and our custom Airtable CRMs are the best out there. 

How does your consulting work, is it long-term?

We want to be apart of your team as long as you want and need. Whether it’s short-term, long-term, as needed or indefinitely, we’re here for you. By the hour, by the week or by the month, we’re ready.

Do you provide training? If so what types?

Yes. We provide training for you or your staff. Not only will we provide any type of service but we will teach you how to do it as well. We also provide sales training, trade-show training and design and presentation skills.
